changeSet.author: Francois Gautier
changeSet.comment: WS Plugin specific tables for backend dispatch

column.name: ID_PK
column.remarks: Primary key identifying the record of the table

column.name: CREATION_TIME
column.remarks: The date and time when this record was created

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.remarks: The user who created this record

column.name: MODIFICATION_TIME
column.remarks: The date and time when this record was last modified

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.remarks: The user who last modified this record

column.name: MESSAGE_ID
column.remarks: ID of the domibus message log

column.name: FINAL_RECIPIENT
column.remarks: Final recipient of the domibus message

column.name: BACKEND_MESSAGE_STATUS
column.remarks: The status describing the state of the backend message

column.name: BACKEND_MESSAGE_TYPE
column.remarks: The type describing the kind backend message

column.name: SENT
column.remarks: DateTime when the message had been dispatched

column.name: FAILED
column.remarks: DateTime when the message had failed

column.name: SCHEDULED
column.remarks: true if the backend message is already scheduled to be sent
